mapper.select: SELECT PROD_CODE , PROD_NAME , PROD_MANUFAC , PROD_PRICE , PROD_AGE , PROD_EFFI , PROD_RECOM , PROD_SITE , PROD_COOK , PROD_VOLUME , PROD_GRADE , PROD_INGRA , PROD_SIZE , PROD_DATE , PROD_STATUS , PROD_IMAGE , PROD_VISIT FROM PROD

SELECT PROD_CODE , PROD_NAME , PROD_MANUFAC , PROD_PRICE , PROD_AGE , PROD_EFFI , PROD_RECOM , PROD_SITE , PROD_COOK , PROD_VOLUME , PROD_GRADE , PROD_INGRA , PROD_SIZE , PROD_DATE , PROD_STATUS , PROD_IMAGE , PROD_VISIT FROM PROD WHERE PROD_CODE = #{ prodCode }

SELECT PROD_CODE , PROD_NAME , PROD_MANUFAC , PROD_PRICE , PROD_AGE , PROD_EFFI , PROD_RECOM , PROD_SITE , PROD_COOK , PROD_VOLUME , PROD_GRADE , PROD_INGRA , PROD_SIZE , PROD_DATE , PROD_STATUS , PROD_IMAGE FROM PROD WHERE PROD_CODE = #{ prodCode1 } OR PROD_CODE = #{ prodCode2 }

SELECT PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, PROD_MANUFAC, PROD_PRICE, PROD_AGE, PROD_EFFI, PROD_RECOM, PROD_SITE, PROD_COOK, PROD_VOLUME, PROD_GRADE, PROD_INGRA, PROD_SIZE, PROD_DATE, PROD_STATUS, PROD_IMAGE FROM PROD
PROD_NAME Like CONCAT('%', #{ value }, '%')
AND PROD_PRICE <= #{ prodPrice }
AND PROD_AGE IN (#{ prodAge }, '전체')
AND PROD_EFFI Like CONCAT ('%', #{ prodEffi }, '%')
AND PROD_RECOM IN (#{ prodRecom }, '전체')
AND PROD_COOK = #{ prodCook }
AND PROD_SIZE < 8
AND PROD_SIZE BETWEEN 8 AND 13
AND PROD_SIZE > 13

SELECT PROD_CODE , PROD_NAME , PROD_MANUFAC , PROD_PRICE , PROD_AGE , PROD_EFFI , PROD_RECOM , PROD_SITE , PROD_COOK , PROD_VOLUME , PROD_GRADE , PROD_INGRA , PROD_SIZE , PROD_DATE , PROD_STATUS , PROD_IMAGE , PROD_VISIT FROM PROD

SELECT PROD_CODE , PROD_NAME , PROD_MANUFAC , PROD_PRICE , PROD_AGE , PROD_EFFI , PROD_RECOM , PROD_SITE , PROD_COOK , PROD_VOLUME , PROD_GRADE , PROD_INGRA , PROD_SIZE , PROD_DATE , PROD_STATUS , PROD_IMAGE , PROD_VISIT FROM PROD WHERE PROD_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', REGEXP_REPLACE(#{prodName}, '\\s[0-9]+(\\.[0-9]+)?[a-zA-Z]*$', ''), '%')

SELECT PROD_CODE , PROD_NAME , PROD_MANUFAC , PROD_PRICE , PROD_AGE , PROD_EFFI , PROD_RECOM , PROD_SITE , PROD_COOK , PROD_VOLUME , PROD_GRADE , PROD_INGRA , PROD_SIZE , PROD_DATE , PROD_STATUS , PROD_IMAGE , PROD_VISIT FROM PROD
WHERE PROD_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ input }, '%')
WHERE PROD_MANUFAC LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ input }, '%')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PROD WHERE PROD_CODE = #{ prodCode }
